subject: Soccer
Children and Childhood
Sports Injuries
Concussions
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Some members of the 1999 United States women’s national team that won the World Cup are are calling for guidelines to eliminate heading the ball before players are 14.
snippet: Some members of the 1999 United States women’s national team that won the World Cup are are calling for guidelines to eliminate heading the ball before players are 14.
